name: 3 Robot Shooter character sprites
description:
Character Robot Shooter V1.

The robot character builds for side scroll shooter, but it is also possible to become run n gun. The robot character asset is made with vector software and animated with brushmonkey spriter pro. To edit the robot you can use adobe illustrator cs 4 or higher and if want to edit the animation u can use Spriter Pro. Also, i add PNG files and Gif animated files with no background.

Sample Animation here

In this package, there are 23 movements and 5 additional animations.

⦁ dash

⦁ die

⦁ die 2

⦁ fall

⦁ fall get hit

⦁ fly

⦁ fly get hit

⦁ fly to fall

⦁ get hit

⦁ idle

⦁ idle to aim front

⦁ idle to aim up

⦁ idle to aim top

⦁ idle to dash

⦁ idle to fly

⦁ idle to slash

⦁ landing

⦁ shoot front

⦁ shoot up

⦁ shoot top

⦁ walk

⦁ walk aim front

⦁ walk aim up

additional animation ;

⦁ effect 1

⦁ effect 2

⦁ effect 3

⦁ effect 4

⦁ effect shoot 1
